import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{techniques}from'../data/techniques';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TechniqueList=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const handleTechniqueClick=techniqueId=>{navigate(`/technique/${techniqueId}`);};// Category colors
const getCategoryColor=category=>{const colors={'Submission':'#ff6b6b','Guard':'#4ecdc4','Takedown':'#45b7d1','Escape':'#96ceb4','Takedown Defenses':'#feca57','Positions':'#ff9ff3','Sweeps':'#54a0ff'};return colors[category]||'#95a5a6';};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"BJJ Techniques"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Master the art of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu with these fundamental techniques"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"technique-grid",children:techniques.map(technique=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"technique-card",onClick:()=>handleTechniqueClick(technique.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"technique-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:technique.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"category-label",style:{backgroundColor:getCategoryColor(technique.category)},children:technique.category})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[technique.description.substring(0,150),"..."]})]},technique.id))})]});};export default TechniqueList;
